tool_description: Summarize articles, research papers, or even entire books using various extractive text summarization algorithms. Available in over a dozen languages (English, French, Spanish, etc.). The web application can be accessed here: https://summarizen.com/
name: Summarizen - Extractive Text Summarization
title: Summarizen - Extractive Text Summarization

api_list.name: Generate a text's summary
api_list.description:
This endpoint requires a text document in the form of a string along with the summary size you want in a float and you can generate summaries.  

The endpoint also offers multiple optional parameters such as language, type of summarization algorithm, and various text processing options.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://summarizen-extractive-text-summarization.p.rapidapi.com/summarize-text"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "summarizen-extractive-text-summarization.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get a text's key sentences
